channel.title: NLP on Aryaman Arora
channel.description: Recent content in NLP on Aryaman Arora

item.title: Interventional interpretability I: Causal abstraction
item.description: Overview of the new intervention-based methods for interpretability.

item.title: The Hittite problem
item.description: How do we interpret neural networks? We should start by comparing it to the geopolitical situation of early Indo-European Anatolia.

item.title: Some intuitions about transformers
item.description: I've been thinking about transformers a lot recently.

item.title: NAACL 2022
item.description: NAACL was the best conference experience I've ever had, no doubt about it.

item.title: A machine-learned syntactic tagset?
item.description: Messing with the Kitaev et al. (2022) parser.

item.title: ACL 2020
item.description: ACL 2020 was the most exciting event in my life so far as a proto-computational linguist. This was my first conference, and my first published research paper.

item.title: Hindi adpositions
item.description: These are just some notes about Hindi SNACS that I wanted to be publicly available. I would use Google Docs, but they don't have good support for interlinear glosses. I would use Xposition, but I'm not really sure what the best place for it is there.
